snippet: Gen. Ilker Basbug faces charges in a long-running case involving accusations of a plot to overthrow Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan’s pro-Islamic government.
abstract: Civilian court orders the arrest of Turkey’s former head of the army, General Ilker Basbug, the highest-ranking officer so far to be charged in a long-running case involving accusations of a plot by an illegal network to overthrow Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan’s pro-Islamic government.
lead_paragraph: Gen. Ilker Basbug faces charges in a long-running case involving accusations of a plot to overthrow Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan’s pro-Islamic government.

headline.seo: Turkey Arrests Ex-Chief of Military, Gen. Ilker Basbug
headline.main: Ex-Chief of Turkish Army Is Arrested in Widening Case Alleging Coup Plot
headline.print_headline: Ex-Chief of Turkish Army Is Arrested In Widening Case Alleging Coup Plot

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
